translations: 兆兆字节（信息量度单位, terabyte 的复数）

sentences.sentence: A single test flight may produce as much as 10 to 15 terabytes of data.
sentences.translation: 一次单独的测试飞行可能产生10到15千吉比特的数据。

sentences.sentence: Specify the size in bytes, kilobytes, megabytes, gigabytes, or terabytes.
sentences.translation: 以字节、KB、MB、GB 或 TB 为单位指定大小。

sentences.sentence: To put it another way, a single zettabyte equals 1,073,741,824 terabytes!
sentences.translation: 换一种方式来表达的话，一个zettabyte等于1,073,741,824个太字节！
